## GuestServer.register() method

Pass an interface of methods which Host may call as callbacks.

**Signature:**

```typescript
register(implementedMethods: Outgoing, metadata: GuestMetadata): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  implementedMethods | Outgoing |  |
|  metadata | [GuestMetadata](./uix-core.guestmetadata.md) |  |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Remarks

It is preferable to use [register()](./uix-guest.register.md) to obtain a guest object and register local methods in one step. The returned guest object will be pre-registered and connected.
